Crescent.card_desc: [F] Dropping below {scale=15|15}% of your max health reduces the cooldown of Lunar Leap by 100%.

Full Moon.card_desc: [F] Gain a {scale=100|100} health shield for 3s when you use Lunar Leap.

Goddess' Blessing.card_desc: [Moonlight] Allies being healed by Moonlight gain 25% damage reduction.

Life Link.card_desc: Luna now heals allies around her for 300 health per second.

Lunar Connection.card_desc: [Q] Reduce the cooldown of Luna's initial deploy by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Moonlight Garden.card_desc: [Armor] Hits with Light Bow restore {scale=2|2}% Moonlight.

Moonwalk.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity and increase your air control by {scale=50|10}% while using Moonlight.

Protectors.card_desc: [Q] Luna restores {scale=2|2}% Moonlight every 1s in a 30 foot range.

Restored Faith.card_desc: [RMB] Healing with Moonlight heals Io for {scale=10|10} health.

Sacrifice.card_desc: If Io falls below 200 health while Luna is active, she trades places with Luna, heals, and Luna dies in her stead.

Sanctum of Faith.card_desc: [RMB] Regenerate {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 1s when not using Moonlight.

Sky Walker.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity and increase your air control by {scale=50|10}% while firing your Light Bow.

Spirit Arrows.card_desc: [RMB] Healing with Moonlight reduces the cooldown of Luna's redeploy by {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Swift Arrows.card_desc: [RMB] Allies gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed while being healed by Moonlight.
